title: Why are these champions banned (every) almost every single game
body: {{champion:24}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:420}} are banned in pretty much 99% of games now.

replies.body: coz {{champion:24}} gets out of control real quick, {{champion:36}} because no top laner wants to take {{summoner:14}} anymore, and {{champion:420}}  because tentacle anal rape is bad for your health.

Jax = Your team is bronze.
Mundo = OP.
Illaoi = No one knows how to counter such an easy champion.

things that are actually op atm:

ignite
hammer (10% cdr costs 5ad broken...)
warrior enchantment from comparts (broken ad scaling)

ill, maybe
